DOC.brief_summary: Optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) well-established safe technique offer possibility visualize retinal structure measure retinal thickness . Time-domain ( TD ) OCT consider `` gold standard '' technique retinal thickness measurement . Spectral-domain ( SD ) OCT face gold standard technique prior obtain scientific clinical consensus . In study healthy subject foveal thickness measure TD SD OCT , data compare evidence difference two retinal measurement technique .
DOC.brief_title: Agreement Between Spectral Domain Time Domain Optical Coherence Tomography ( OCT )
DOC.detailed_description: The study perform Ophthalmology Clinic University Chieti-Pescara , Italy . Forty healthy individual enrol study . In session one randomly select eye subject three consecutive measurement foveal thickness perform use TD OCT FD OCT. All measurement obtain experienced examinator . Time domain optical coherence tomography image obtain eye pupil dilation use Stratus OCT system ( version 4.1 . Carl Zeiss Meditec , Dublin , CA ) . Spectral domain optical coherence tomography image obtain use HRA-OCT Spectralis unit ( Heidelberg Engineering GmbH , Heidelberg , Germany ) . All data analyze statistical package MedCalc® version 8.1 Windows ( MedCalc® , Mariakerke , Belgium ) . The D'Agostino-Pearson test computes single P-value combination coefficient Skewness Kurtosis use study sample distribution . T-test use compare mean Stratus Spectralis measurement orizontal vertical measurement . To assess agreement Spectralis Stratus OCT foveal measurement Bland Altman plot agreement foveal thickness use . For orizontal vertical foveal measurement ratio ( Spectralis/stratus OCT foveal thickness ) plot average two measurement .
DOC.criteria: healthy subject systemic eye disease previous ocular surgery laser treatment systemic ocular therapy
